short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notified when price of an item drops on Amazon website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to create a product list from amazon.in. Users can provide a threshold value for each product. When the price of the product drops below the threshold value, the user is notified through email.
